label: Deposit
description: The permanent addition of items to the collection, where the transfer of ownership is conditional on certain requirements or restrictions, but without financial payment or reciprocal transfer of items.

label: Donation
description: The permanent addition of items to the collection through the transfer of ownership, without financial payment.

label: Purchase
description: The permanent addition of items to the collection through the transfer of ownership, accompanied by one or more financial payments.

label: Loan
description: The temporary addition of items to the collection with no transfer of ownership, without financial payment.

label: License
description: The temporary addition of items to the collection with no transfer of ownership, accompanied by one or more financial payments.

label: Item Creation
description: The permanent addition of items to the collection as a result of item creation by the owner of the collection.
